title: Ivanka Trump
summary: Ivana Marie "Ivanka" Trump (/ɪˈvɑːŋkə/; born October 30, 1981)[1] is an American businesswoman and the daughter of former President Donald Trump; she was a senior advisor in his administration, and also was the director of the Office of Economic Initiatives and Entrepreneurship.[3][4][5] She is the daughter of Trump's first wife, Ivana, and is the first Jewish member of a first family, having converted before marrying her husband, Jared Kushner.[6]
